title: Kourtney Kardashian wishes Rob's ex Adrienne Bailon happy birthday
text:
They've remained friends despite a unique family situation.

And Kourtney Kardashian shared a happy birthday message to Adrienne Bailon on Instagram Thursday morning.

The 40-year-old lifestyle blogger sat alongside the birthday girl who was previously in a relationship with Kourtney's younger brother Rob.

Friends forever: Kourtney Kardashian shared a happy birthday message to Adrienne Bailon on Instagram Thursday morning

Kourtney wrote 'feliz cumpleaños mi amor' across a photo of the pair cuddled up on a wicker chair.

The mother-of-three looked sensational in a black lace dress while Adrienne rocked a gown with massive floral appliques.

Their friendship began many years ago when Adrienne was dating Kourtney's younger brother Rob.

In the past: Their friendship began many years ago when Adrienne was dating Kourtney's younger brother Rob; seen in 2008

Where it all began: Adrienne was along for the ride as Rob's leading lady when Keeping Up With The Kardashians launched in 2007; seen in 2008

Adrienne was along for the ride as Rob's leading lady when Keeping Up With The Kardashians launched in 2007.

The couple dated for two years and ultimately went their separate ways after she later confirmed he had cheated on her.

The Real host admitted during an episode of the show in 2017 that Kourtney was the one she leaned on the most during the difficult breakup.

'When I broke up with Rob Kardashian, my break up buddy was his sister, Kourtney, who at the time had broken up with Scott for a moment,' she said.

Strong: The Real host admitted during an episode of the show in 2017 that Kourtney was the one she leaned on the most during the difficult breakup; seen in 2009

'When I broke up with Rob Kardashian, my break up buddy was his sister, Kourtney, who at the time had broken up with Scott for a moment,' she said; seen in 2010

Single Kourtney 'was so much fun' and exactly who Adrienne needed to get her mind out of a dark place.

'I was definitely more the sad one crying at home and she was like, "No girl, we are going to go out. We're going to hit the clubs in Hollywood. We're going to have so much fun!"' she recalled. 'And I needed that because we were both going through the same thing but we dealt with the breakup differently.'

Adrienne's remained a friend to the family and was most recently spotted at Kourtney's poolside Poosh event at her home in Calabasas, California.
